caption.center: GUIDO TORTOLANO et ux. v. ALBERT DiPHILIPPO, JR. v. THE

opinion.posture: Motion of appellees to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court under Rule 16(g), as amended, is denied.
opinion.attorneys:
Morriss Vacca, Anthony Vacca, for appellees.
Bevilacqua Cicilline, Stephen E. Cicilline, for appellant Albert DiPhilippo, Jr.Page 930
